ValidationRule.description: If the revenue recognition date is later than the expected completion date, the revenue delay flag must be checked.
ValidationRule.errorConditionFormula: AND( IsClosed = FALSE, Revenue_Recognition_Delay__c = FALSE, Project_Exp_Rev_Rec_Date__c > PSCase_Project_Exp_Compl_Date__c )
ValidationRule.errorMessage: Please check the revenue delay flag or adjust the project dates
